847:4: tasmin rāganirākṛtau nahi kathā dveṣakṣaye jāyate
847:5: dveṣasyāpi nirākṛtau nahi kathā rāgakṣaye jāyate || 1 ||
847:6: mānāderapi yat kṣayāya vacanaṃ nānyaṃ malaṃ hanti tat
847:7: tasmādvayāpitaraṃ na tatra ca punastāstā mahārthāḥ kathāḥ |
847:8: mā mohasya parikṣayāya tu kathā kleśānaśeṣānasau
847:10: mohasyāsya parikṣayāya ca yato dṛṣṭāḥ pratītyādaya-
847:11: stattvaṃ tat pratipacca saiva sugataiḥ saṃkīrtitā madhyamā |
847:12: kāyo dharmamayo muneḥ sa ca yataḥ sā śūnyatetyucyate
847:13: buddhānāṃ hṛdayaṃ sa cāpi mahatī vidyeti saṃkīrtyate || 3 ||
847:18: gambhīraṃ jinaśāsanaṃ na hi jano yo vetti tatsaṃvide
847:19: maunīndrād vacasaḥ pṛthaṅnigadituṃ vāñchanti tattvaṃ ca ye |
847:20: anye ye'pi kubuddhayaḥ pravacanaṃ vyācakṣate cānyathā
847:21: teṣāṃ cāpi nirākṛtau kṛtamidaṃ śāstraṃ hatāntardvayam || 5 ||
847:26: āyātāya śiro'rthiṃne karuṇayā protkṛtya dattvā śiraḥ
847:27: saṃyāte tu sukhāvatīṃ jinasute nāgārjune tatkṛtāḥ |
847:28: granthāḥ śiṣyagaṇāśca te'pi bahunā kālena nāśaṃ gatāḥ
847:29: tattvārke'stamite'dhunā na hi mataṃ spaṣṭaṃ tadasti kvacit || 7 ||
847:33: dhanyo'sau kṣaṇamapyapāsya vimatiṃ yaḥ śūnyatāṃ gāhate || 8 ||
847:35: ścittvotplutya ca yāti vastuparikhāṃ caiko mṛgo'sau mahān |
847:36: taṃ pratyadya na cintayā mama guṇaścaikastu yo nādhunā
847:37: taṃ pratyeva tadanyaśāstramathanī vṛttiḥ kṛteyaṃ mayā || 9 ||
847:41: yā cāsāvatha vigrahasya racitā vyāvartinī tāmapi || 10 ||
847:42: dṛṣṭvā tacchatakādikaṃ bahuvidhaṃ sūtraṃ gabhīraṃ tathā
847:43: vṛttiṃ cāpyatha buddhapālitakṛtāṃ sūkṣmāṃ ca yadbhāvinā |
847:52: yatpuṇyaṃ mama śūnyateva vipulaṃ tenaiva loko'khila-
847:55: sambuddhān sakalaṃ jinātmajagaṇaṃ dharmaṃ ca tairbhāṣitam |
847:57: yo'muṃ madhyamakaṃ cakāra kṛpayā nāgārjunastaṃ name || 14 ||
